service.service_embed: <object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="{w}" height="{h}" data="http://picasaweb.google.com/s/c/bin/slideshow.swf"> <param name="movie" value="http://picasaweb.google.com/s/c/bin/slideshow.swf"> <param name="flashvars" value="RGB=0x000000&feed=http://picasaweb.google.com/data/feed/api/user/{serviceVAL}/albumid/{serviceVAL2}?alt=rss"> <param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"> <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"> <param name="allownetworking" value="all" /> </object>
